entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:35 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 9:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
